# pds-box



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                       | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size of the column for all screen sizes that are not explicitly set.                              | `string` | `undefined` |
| `sizeLg` | `size-lg` | At screen sizes greater than the `LG` breakpoint, this will take the number of columns specified. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `sizeMd` | `size-md` | At screen sizes greater than the `MD` breakpoint, this will take the number of columns specified. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `sizeSm` | `size-sm` | At screen sizes greater than the `SM` breakpoint, this will take the number of columns specified. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `sizeXl` | `size-xl` | At screen sizes greater than the `XL` breakpoint, this will take the number of columns specified. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `sizeXs` | `size-xs` | At screen sizes less than the `XS` breakpoint, this will take the number of columns specified.    | `string` | `undefined` |


----------------------------------------------
